data.actual_result: the influenced user appears in filter and clicking doesnt show the action influenced
data.expected_result: a. the influenced user doesn't appear or b. tapping influenced user shows the audit
data.short_description: audit logs user filter shows users influenced by actions but shows no content for them
data.steps_to_repro: - create an influence on a user, such as changing their roles - open audit log and click filter - notice the influenced user appearing, and click
